verses.verse: Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Go in <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and tell <S%H1696><s%> <S%H413><s%> him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> Let <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me.
For <S%H3588><s%> if <S%H518><s%> thou <S%H859><s%> refuse <S%H3986><s%> to let them go, <S%H7971><s%> and wilt hold <S%H2388><s%> them still, <S%H5750><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> upon thy cattle <S%H4735><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in the field, <S%H7704><s%> upon the horses, <S%H5483><s%> upon the asses, <S%H2543><s%> upon the camels, <S%H1581><s%> upon the oxen, <S%H1241><s%> and upon the sheep: <S%H6629><s%> there shall be a very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%> murrain. <S%H1698><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall sever <S%H6395><s%> between <S%H996><s%> the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> and the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt: <S%H4714><s%> and there shall nothing <S%H3808><s%> <S%H1697><s%> die <S%H4191><s%> of all <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3605><s%> that is the children's <S%H1121><s%> of Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> appointed <S%H7760><s%> a set time, <S%H4150><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> shall do <S%H6213><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> in the land. <S%H776><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H853><s%> that <S%H2088><s%> thing <S%H1697><s%> on the morrow, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4283><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the cattle <S%H4735><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> died: <S%H4191><s%> but of the cattle <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4735><s%> of the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> one. <S%H259><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and, behold, <S%H2009><s%> there was not <S%H3808><s%> one <S%H259><s%> of the cattle <S%H4480><s%> <S%H4735><s%> of the Israelites <S%H3478><s%> dead. <S%H4191><s%> And the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was hardened, <S%H3513><s%> and he did not <S%H3808><s%> let <S%H853><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%> go. <S%H7971><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> and unto <S%H413><s%> Aaron, <S%H175><s%> Take <S%H3947><s%> to you handfuls <S%H4393><s%> <S%H2651><s%> of ashes <S%H6368><s%> of the furnace, <S%H3536><s%> and let Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkle <S%H2236><s%> it toward the heaven <S%H8064><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of Pharaoh. <S%H6547><s%>

And it shall become <S%H1961><s%> small dust <S%H80><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> and shall be <S%H1961><s%> a boil <S%H7822><s%> breaking forth <S%H6524><s%> with blains <S%H76><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H853><s%> ashes <S%H6368><s%> of the furnace, <S%H3536><s%> and stood <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh; <S%H6547><s%> and Moses <S%H4872><s%> sprinkled <S%H2236><s%> it up toward heaven; <S%H8064><s%> and it became <S%H1961><s%> a boil <S%H7822><s%> breaking forth <S%H6524><s%> with blains <S%H76><s%> upon man, <S%H120><s%> and upon beast. <S%H929><s%>

And the magicians <S%H2748><s%> could <S%H3201><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Moses <S%H4872><s%> because of <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the boils; <S%H7822><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the boil <S%H7822><s%> was <S%H1961><s%> upon the magicians, <S%H2748><s%> and upon all <S%H3605><s%> the Egyptians. <S%H4714><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hardened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H853><s%> the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and he hearkened <S%H8085><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them; as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Rise up early <S%H7925><s%> in the morning, <S%H1242><s%> and stand <S%H3320><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and say <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God <S%H430><s%> of the Hebrews, <S%H5680><s%> Let <S%H853><s%> my people <S%H5971><s%> go, <S%H7971><s%> that they may serve <S%H5647><s%> me.

For <S%H3588><s%> I <S%H589><s%> will at this <S%H2063><s%> time <S%H6471><s%> send <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> my plagues <S%H4046><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> thine heart, <S%H3820><s%> and upon thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> and upon thy people; <S%H5971><s%> that <S%H5668><s%> thou mayest know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> there is none <S%H369><s%> like me <S%H3644><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> now <S%H6258><s%> I will stretch out <S%H7971><s%> <S%H853><s%> my hand, <S%H3027><s%> that I may smite <S%H5221><s%> thee and thy people <S%H5971><s%> with pestilence; <S%H1698><s%> and thou shalt be cut off <S%H3582><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And in very deed <S%H199><s%> for <S%H5668><s%> this <S%H2063><s%> cause have I raised thee up, <S%H5975><s%> for <S%H5668><s%> to show <S%H7200><s%> in thee <S%H853><s%> my power; <S%H3581><s%> and that <S%H4616><s%> my name <S%H8034><s%> may be declared <S%H5608><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the earth. <S%H776><s%>
As yet <S%H5750><s%> exaltest thou thyself <S%H5549><s%> against my people, <S%H5971><s%> that thou wilt not <S%H1115><s%> let them go? <S%H7971><s%>

Behold, <S%H2009><s%> tomorrow <S%H4279><s%> about this time <S%H6256><s%> I will cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> a very <S%H3966><s%> grievous <S%H3515><s%> hail, <S%H1259><s%> such <S%H834><s%> as <S%H3644><s%> hath not <S%H3808><s%> been <S%H1961><s%> in Egypt <S%H4714><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3117><s%> the foundation <S%H3245><s%> thereof even until <S%H5704><s%> now. <S%H6258><s%>

Send <S%H7971><s%> therefore now, <S%H6258><s%> and gather <S%H5756><s%> <S%H853><s%> thy cattle, <S%H4735><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> thou hast in the field; <S%H7704><s%> for upon every <S%H3605><s%> man <S%H120><s%> and beast <S%H929><s%> which <S%H834><s%> shall be found <S%H4672><s%> in the field, <S%H7704><s%> and shall not <S%H3808><s%> be brought <S%H622><s%> home, <S%H1004><s%> the hail <S%H1259><s%> shall come down <S%H3381><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> them, and they shall die. <S%H4191><s%>

He that feared <S%H3372><s%> <S%H853><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> among the servants <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5650><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> made <S%H853><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> and his cattle <S%H4735><s%> flee <S%H5127><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the houses: <S%H1004><s%>

And he that <S%H834><s%> regarded <S%H7760><s%> <S%H3820><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> <S%H853><s%> his servants <S%H5650><s%> and his cattle <S%H4735><s%> in the field. <S%H7704><s%>

And the LORD <S%H3068><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> Moses, <S%H4872><s%> Stretch forth <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> heaven, <S%H8064><s%> that there may be <S%H1961><s%> hail <S%H1259><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt, <S%H4714><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> man, <S%H120><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> beast, <S%H929><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> throughout the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> stretched forth <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> his rod <S%H4294><s%> toward <S%H5921><s%> heaven: <S%H8064><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> sent <S%H5414><s%> thunder <S%H6963><s%> and hail, <S%H1259><s%> and the fire <S%H784><s%> ran along <S%H1980><s%> upon the ground; <S%H776><s%> and the LORD <S%H3068><s%> rained <S%H4305><s%> hail <S%H1259><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt. <S%H4714><s%>

So there was <S%H1961><s%> hail, <S%H1259><s%> and fire <S%H784><s%> mingled <S%H3947><s%> with <S%H8432><s%> the hail, <S%H1259><s%> very <S%H3966><s%> grievous, <S%H3515><s%> such as <S%H834><s%> there was <S%H1961><s%> none <S%H3808><s%> like it <S%H3644><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> <S%H227><s%> it became <S%H1961><s%> a nation. <S%H1471><s%>

And the hail <S%H1259><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> throughout all <S%H3605><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> <S%H853><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> that <S%H834><s%> was in the field, <S%H7704><s%> both man <S%H4480><s%> <S%H120><s%> and beast; <S%H929><s%> and the hail <S%H1259><s%> smote <S%H5221><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> herb <S%H6212><s%> of the field, <S%H7704><s%> and broke <S%H7665><s%> every <S%H3605><s%> tree <S%H6086><s%> of the field. <S%H7704><s%>

Only <S%H7535><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> of Goshen, <S%H1657><s%> where <S%H834><s%> <S%H8033><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> were, was <S%H1961><s%> there no <S%H3808><s%> hail. <S%H1259><s%>

And Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> sent, <S%H7971><s%> and called <S%H7121><s%> for Moses <S%H4872><s%> and Aaron, <S%H175><s%> and said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> them, I have sinned <S%H2398><s%> this time: <S%H6471><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is righteous, <S%H6662><s%> and I <S%H589><s%> and my people <S%H5971><s%> are wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

Entreat <S%H6279><s%> <S%H413><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> (for it is enough) <S%H7227><s%> that there be no <S%H4480><s%> <S%H1961><s%> more mighty <S%H430><s%> thunderings <S%H6963><s%> and hail; <S%H1259><s%> and I will let you go, <S%H7971><s%> and ye shall stay <S%H5975><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> longer. <S%H3254><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> him, As soon as I am gone out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the city, <S%H5892><s%> I will spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> <S%H853><s%> my hands <S%H3709><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> and the thunder <S%H6963><s%> shall cease, <S%H2308><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> shall there be <S%H1961><s%> any more <S%H5750><s%> hail; <S%H1259><s%> that <S%H4616><s%> thou mayest know <S%H3045><s%> how that <S%H3588><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%> is the LORD's. <S%H3068><s%>

But as for thee <S%H859><s%> and thy servants, <S%H5650><s%> I know <S%H3045><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> ye will not yet <S%H2962><s%> fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> God. <S%H430><s%>

And the flax <S%H6594><s%> and the barley <S%H8184><s%> was smitten: <S%H5221><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the barley <S%H8184><s%> was in the ear, <S%H24><s%> and the flax <S%H6594><s%> was bolled. <S%H1392><s%>
But the wheat <S%H2406><s%> and the rye <S%H3698><s%> were not <S%H3808><s%> smitten: <S%H5221><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> they <S%H2007><s%> were not grown up. <S%H648><s%>

And Moses <S%H4872><s%> went out <S%H3318><s%> of <S%H853><s%> the city <S%H5892><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5973><s%> Pharaoh, <S%H6547><s%> and spread abroad <S%H6566><s%> his hands <S%H3709><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> the LORD: <S%H3068><s%> and the thunders <S%H6963><s%> and hail <S%H1259><s%> ceased, <S%H2308><s%> and the rain <S%H4306><s%> was not <S%H3808><s%> poured <S%H5413><s%> upon the earth. <S%H776><s%>

And when Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> that <S%H3588><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> and the hail <S%H1259><s%> and the thunders <S%H6963><s%> were ceased, <S%H2308><s%> he sinned <S%H2398><s%> yet more, <S%H3254><s%> and hardened <S%H3513><s%> his heart, <S%H3820><s%> he <S%H1931><s%> and his servants. <S%H5650><s%>

And the heart <S%H3820><s%> of Pharaoh <S%H6547><s%> was hardened, <S%H2388><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> would he let <S%H853><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> go; <S%H7971><s%> as <S%H834><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> by <S%H3027><s%> Moses. <S%H4872><s%>
